channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A Chicago street vendor couple has a defiant response to immigration arrests: Stick to the routine
item.description: Ofelia Herrera and Rafael Hernandez have refused to alter their routines as street food vendors during an immigration enforcement blitz in Chicago that has caused many without legal status to stay home since it began in early September.

item.title: Investigators say UPS plane that crashed in Kentucky, killing 14, had cracks in engine mount
Dramatic photos of doomed UPS plane show the aircraft on fire and its engine flying off
